Styleguide

TOR

The Onion Router was originally developed by the Office of Naval Research and DARPA to provide protection for online intelligence. This fact alone might raise some eyebrows about TOR's integrity.

Most people are familiar with TOR through the popular dark web drug marketplace called Silk Road. Indeed, even the FBI recognizes that TOR has 'legitimate uses'. TOR gets a bad wrap for the criminal elements that use it. The TOR Projects maintains that it's use is crucial for whistleblowers, journalists, avoiding identify theft and many other privacy uses.

Setting up the TOR suite will require some time, learning and testing. There are many articles and videos on how to best setup and use TOR.

  • Official TOR Project
  • Dont's of Using TOR
  • TOR Browser Overview
  • Access The Dark Web Safely
  • Staying Safe on the Dark Web
  • Top 5 Dark Web Websites Tour
